1.text: Make a quarter vanish into thin air.

2.text: Bend and re-straighten any spoon instantly.

3.text: Make a pencil float in the palm of your hand.

4.text: Pass an ordinary piece of paper around your body.

5.text: Smash a cup through a table “accidentally.

6.text: Spin a straw around the top of a bottle using only your mind.

7.text: Stand at a slight angle with your back to your audience.

8.text: Caution your onlookers that levitating is an extremely difficult skill.

9.text: Rock up smoothly onto the ball of the foot furthest away from the audience.

10.text: Lower yourself back down to the ground before your audience catches on.

11.text: Explain your objective to your audience as you set up the trick.

12.text: Begin rubbing the coin into your opposite arm.

13.text: Pretend to drop the coin onto the table.

14.text: Pick up the coin with your decoy hand and fake a pass to your other hand.

15.text: Resume rubbing your arm with your empty hand.

16.text: Remove your hand to reveal that the coin has disappeared.
